desc: Valley View Winery, Oregon Winery, Tempranillo, Cabernet Sauvignon, Rogue Valley, Oregon Tempranillo, Oregon Pinot Noir, Rogue Red, Rogue Valley wines, Applegate Valley wines, Southern Oregon wineries, Oregon winery, Old vine Cabernet Sauvignon, Chardonnay, Viognier, Oregon Viognier, Applegate Valley Viognier

layout.text: As one of the first wineries in Oregon, Valley View helped create the Oregonian wine scene from its very origin.
